snippet: Former Maricopa County Attorney Andrew Thomas was found to have violated the rules for lawyers in bringing criminal charges against officials with the purpose of embarrassing them.
abstract: Arizona ethics board disbars Mariopa County's former top prosecutor Andrew Thomas for violating rules of conduct in bringing criminal charges against two county officials and a judge in Dec 2009 with purpose of embarrassing them.
lead_paragraph: Former Maricopa County Attorney Andrew Thomas was found to have violated the rules for lawyers in bringing criminal charges against officials with the purpose of embarrassing them.

headline.seo: Arizona Ethics Board Disbars Ex-Maricopa County Prosecutor
headline.main: Former Prosecutor in Arizona Is Disbarred
headline.print_headline: Former Prosecutor in Arizona Is Disbarred
